   19: %%
   20: -module(timetrap_7_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -compile(export_all).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: 
   26: -define(TO, 1).
   27: -define(HANG, 6).
   28: 
   29: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   30: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   31: %% Info = [tuple()]
   32: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   33: suite() ->
   34:     [{timetrap,{timetrap_utils,timetrap_timeout,[{seconds,?HANG},
   35: 						 {seconds,?TO}]}}].
   36: 
   37: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   39: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   40: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   41: %% Reason = term()
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   44:     Config.
   45: 
   46: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   47: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   48: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   54: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   55: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   56: %% GroupName = atom()
   57: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   58: %% Reason = term()
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   64: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   65: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   66: %% GroupName = atom()
   67: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   70:     ok.
   71: 
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   74: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   75: %% TestCase = atom()
   76: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   77: %% Reason = term()
   78: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   79: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   80:     Config.
   81: 
   82: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   83: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   84: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   85: %% TestCase = atom()
   86: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: end_per_testcase(_, _Config) ->
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   92: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   93: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   94: %% GroupName = atom()
   95: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   96: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   97: %% TestCase = atom()
   98: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
   99: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  100: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  101: %% N = integer() | forever
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: groups() ->
  104:     [].
  105: 
  106: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  107: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  108: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  109: %% GroupName = atom()
  110: %% TestCase = atom()
  111: %% Reason = term()
  112: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  113: all() ->
  114:     [tc0,tc1,tc2,tc3].
  115: 
  116: tc0(_) ->
  117:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("TO after ~w+~w sec", [?HANG,?TO])),
  118:     ct:sleep({seconds,10}),
  119:     ok.
  120: 
  121: tc1() ->
  122:     [{timetrap,{timetrap_utils,timetrap_val,[2000]}}].
  123: tc1(_) ->
  124:     ct:comment("TO after 2 sec"),
  125:     ct:sleep({seconds,5}),
  126:     ok.
  127: 
  128: tc2() ->
  129:     [{timetrap,fun() -> timetrap_utils:timetrap_val(500) end}].
  130: tc2(_) ->
  131:     ct:comment("TO after 0.5 sec"),
  132:     ct:sleep(1000),
  133:     ok.
  134: 
  135: tc3(_) ->
  136:     ct:comment(io_lib:format("TO after ~w+~w sec", [?HANG,?TO])),
  137:     ct:sleep({seconds,10}),
  138:     ok.
